net.adamcin.oakpal.core.jcrfacade

Class SessionFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.jcrfacade.SessionFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jcr.Session

    public class SessionFacade
extends Object
implements javax.jcr.Session
    Wraps a Session to guards against writes by listeners.
